metadata.Title: CVE-2023-7042 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: (A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found in ath10k_wmi_tlv_o...)

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
